arts.ttl: Europa League Liveblog: Nice vs. Roma
More than 100 Roma fans arrested in Nice before Europa League match
arts.sum: “A force of more than 200 personnel, including two mobile units, has been deployed in the city center of Nice since yesterday, to prevent any disturbance of public order and has arrested 102 individuals identified as Roma ultras in possession of weapons,” read a statement by the region’s prefecture. A violent altercation broke out Tuesday night and objects were thrown at police officers, while Nice fans reportedly riled up their Roma counterparts by chanting “there’s only Lazio in Rome.”

arts.sum: OGC Nice play host to AS Roma at the Allianz Riviera on Wednesday night, as both teams get their Europa League campaigns underway.

arts.ttl: Nice vs AS Roma – Match preview and team news
arts.sum: AS Roma get their Europa League campaign underway when they face off at the Allianz Riviera against OGC Nice on Wednesday. Both sides arrive with contrasting domestic form, as the French hosts look to rebound from a heavy Ligue 1 defeat. while the Italian visitors come fresh off a crucial derby victory.
